<title level="1" pfs="">[Yniesse Zenderholm](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1959)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Yniesse Zenderholm](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1959)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Shadows at Sundown](/Sources.aspx?ID=121) pg. 35</row>

**Perception** +16

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +0

**Con** +4

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[_lesser sturdy shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327) (Hardness 10, HP 80, BT 40), _+1 [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [Gray Maiden plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=15)_, _+1 [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_, [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 120

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longsword_ +18 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +11 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Erinyes Fury** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** The Erinyes Company agent is suffering from [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); **Effect** The agent makes a Strike. If it hits, it deals an additional 1d6 points of persistent damage; the type of this extra damage is the same as the persistent damage from which they're suffering. The agent can choose to instead have this persistent damage be lawful or evil damage. This counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty

</column>
name: Yniesse Zenderholm

text: Yniesse Zenderholm Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 33 Unspecific Lore : DC 31 Specific Lore : DC 28 Yniesse Zenderholm Source Shadows at Sundown pg. 35 Perception +16 Languages Common, Infernal Skills Athletics +17, Crafting +12, Intimidation +14, Religion +12 Str +4 Dex +0 Con +4 Int +1 Wis +3 Cha +1 Items lesser sturdy shield (Hardness 10, HP 80, BT 40), +1 glamered Gray Maiden plate , +1 longsword , Composite Shortbow (20 arrows) --- AC 25 Fort +17 Ref +11 Will +14 HP 120 --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action longsword +18 (versatile P), Damage 1d8+7 slashing Ranged Single Action shortbow +11 (deadly d10, Propulsive, range increment 60 feet, reload 0), Damage 1d6+6 piercing Erinyes Fury Two Actions Requirements The Erinyes Company agent is suffering from persistent damage; Effect The agent makes a Strike. If it hits, it deals an additional 1d6 points of persistent damage; the type of this extra damage is the same as the persistent damage from which they're suffering. The agent can choose to instead have this persistent damage be lawful or evil damage. This counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty
